review:
I wanted to convey my gratitude to Dr. Jayram D jagiasi from cooper Hospital for the ********* spine treatment. I extremely satisfied with my experience with him and I would also like to place on record the dedication of all orthopaedic doctors and staffs and the management. The doctors are very well-qualified and patient while dealing with the patients. Thank you Dr. Ali and Shreyash for reassuring and guided me through The necessary surgical procedures. 
I was having full of trust in You all. Dr. Ali and Dr. Shreyash was really appreciating to see their approach and Made me realize that I'm in right place with ***** Doctor. Thank you Dr.Jerry, and your team with Dr. Vishal, Dr. PraKash and and Thank you so much to Dr. Shreyash for your kind, caring and dedication. A hospital is considered to be the best place where I would find solace, comfort and feel holistic. Because of your special things done for me. "I can no other word Make but Thanks, and thanks and ever thanks to you". May God blessed you.
Would recommend to everyone I know. Amazing and accurate treatment. I had gone for a bone fracture and dislocation in my fingers and was healed effectively each time.
Due to shoulder pain I could not sleep on that particular shoulder and wake up due to pain. I am satisfied with the treatment and the problem solved

Suffering from leg pain and shoulder pain he's very polite and kind nature he helped with good treatment 
Definitely recommendable.
